contextId.information: These two words mean that fear will come upon them. AT: "Fear will come upon them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
contextId.quote: Terror and dread will fall on them

contextId.information: The "tabernacle" and "tent of meeting" are the same thing. This can be stated in active form. AT: "So the people of Israel finished all of the work on the tabernacle" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: So the work on the tabernacle, the tent of meeting, was finished. The people of Israel did everything
